ticket.title: Minescord Tickets
ticket.description:
> 👋 • Hello! Welcome to the ticket support of the server. To create a ticket, simply react with the 🎫 emoji below. **Remember** to follow the following rules when creating a ticket:

```- Be clear and concise in describing your problem!
- Avoid creating multiple tickets for the same issue.
- Do not share personal or sensitive information.
- Respect the support team.```
> ⭐ • Once a ticket is created, a member of our team will contact you to assist you as soon as possible.

created.title: Minescord Support
created.description: > 👋 • Hello! Welcome to the server support! Please clarify your problem/question so that our team can assist you!
